DOC.brief_summary: Evaluate the clinical activity of sirolimus in combination with cyclosporine and corticosteroids as first line therapy for the treatment of chronic Graft Versus Host Disease.
DOC.brief_title: Sirolimus as Primary Therapy for the Treatment of Chronic Graft Versus Host Disease
DOC.detailed_description: An Open Label Study of Sirolimus as Primary Therapy for the Treatment of Chronic GVHD Following Allogeneic Bone Marrow Transplant
